name: Simon Cs
description:
Our school had a beginner and an advanced class on C++ (no pun intended). The ones who could create this game were accepted to the advanced.

This was my first C++ project, made within a week with zero to no knowledge of the language beforehand. I (roughly) knew how to set up header files, but most of it I figured out from reading references and having an idea what keywords to search for based on previous coding experience.

View the code for this project here on github!

Date: 2019 September 15

Time: 3 days
